name: GMB Cap
description:
Helmet hair is not the best look to be rocking post-ride. 
So why don't you grab yourself a GMB Cap to help hide those tufts after a day out on the bike.

Classic trucker style with black mesh at the back to help keep your head cool on warmer days. 
(Cap only - badge sold separately) 

Show the World that you're a GirlMTNbiker.

*Global Shipping*


Useful things that caps do:
- Hide helmet hair
- Protects your head from sun, bird poop, rain and small falling objects...
- By placing face into mesh you can create a mosquito barrier (tested at Fort William MTB World Cup, with varying levels of success...)
- Good for pinning badges to
- Make you look *cool



*not guaranteed ;-)

name: GMB Sticker
description:
Oooohh Stickery Goodness!

Check out these bad boys guaranteed to make even the most scuffed helmet look like a million pounds.

Stickers are just fun. Fact. These will brighten up even the gloomiest day and put a smile on your face.

Just short of 15cm across and 5cm up.



*Global Postage*

name: GMB Badge
description:
Pin it! 
Grab yourself one of these lovely badges and join the GMB crew.

Looks spiffing on ones camel back or hydration pack of choice.
Complements even the most sweatiest jersey.
Looks mighty fine on a cap too.

Definitely this seasons colours and guaranteed to not make your bum look big.

A winner all around really.
